main.name: Peter Shaker
main.description: A Continous self-Learner. Building state-of-the-art, easy to use, user friendly Web-Apps is truly a passion of mine. I actively seek out new technologies, and stay up-to-date on industry trends and advancements.
main.bio: With 5+ years of hands-on experience efficiently coding web sites and applications using modern HTML5, CSS3, and Object-Oriented / functional JavaScript programming , In addition to Solid Knowledge of JavaScript frameworks like Angular , VueJS & ReactJS and other responsive design frameworks like (Bootstrap , Foundation ) along with CSS preprocessors ( {Less} & Sass) and managing all those with the great bundlers and task runners like ( WebPack , grunt & Gulp) .

testimonials.text: I worked with Peter in the graduation project , A brain tablet interface and from our experience with him I can say that he's a very passionate person in work, very eager to learn, fighter in increasing his skills and challenge himself with new tasks and responsibilities. From the personnel side, Peter is a very selfless person, team player and actually extremely friendly and working with him was really fun

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
